title: 3 and Out - Rams Over Cards MNF Reac, Micah Parsons Impact, Chiefs D (Seriously) Raiders Re-Brand, Top Headlines, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Rams Over Cards MNF Reac, Micah Parsons Impact, Chiefs D (Seriously) Raiders Re-Brand, Top Headlines, Mailbag
description:
John reacts to the Rams MNF road win over the Cardinals, Matt Stafford shining in primetime and explains why everyone should appreciate Kyler Murray is one of the all-time football prodigies. He also looks at the Chiefs surprising defense, and why the Raiders should re-brand the irreversibly toxic franchise. He also hits on some of the top headlines after week 14 and answers listener questions in Middlekauff Mailbag. Make sure you follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
